#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    char ch;
    ch=getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        getline(cin,s);
        int n=s.length(),i=0;
        for(i=0; i<n-1;)
        {
            if(s[i]!=' '&&s[i+1]!=' ')
            {
                cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<"-";
            }
            else if(s[i]!=' '&&s[i+1]==' ')
            {
                cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<"$";
                i++;
            }
            i++;
        }
        if(isalpha(s[i]))
            cout<<(s[i]-97)*(s[i]-97)<<endl;
        else
            cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
